options.content:
Each column represents a different physical site

Vieta

Minerva

panels.description: Spikes on this graph that are missing from the LAN graph indicate gateway-originated traffic, like a scheduled speed test. Rx is on the negative axis.
panels.title: WAN Throughput

panels.description: Spikes on this graph that do not appear on the WAN graph indicate inter-VLAN-routing. Rx is on the negative axis.
panels.title: LAN Throughput

panels.description: Spikes on this graph that are missing from the LAN graph indicate gateway-originated traffic, like a scheduled speed test. Rx is on the negative axis.
panels.title: WAN Throughput

panels.description: Spikes on this graph that do not appear on the WAN graph indicate inter-VLAN-routing. Rx is on the negative axis.
panels.title: LAN Throughput

targets.expr: sum by (name) (rate(unpoller_client_transmit_bytes_total{name!~".*camera.*|.*cam(era)?$", name=~".*", site_name=~".*", ap_name=~"Access Point U6\\+"}[$__interval]))
sum by (name) (rate(unpoller_client_receive_bytes_total{name!~".*camera.*|.*cam(era)?$", name=~".*", site_name=~".*", ap_name=~"Access Point U6\\+"}[$__interval]))
sum by (name) (rate(unpoller_client_transmit_bytes_total{name!~".*camera.*|.*cam(era)?$", name=~".*", site_name=~".*", sw_name=~"(Switch Flex Mini|Vieta)"}[$__interval]))
sum by (name) (rate(unpoller_client_receive_bytes_total{name!~".*camera.*|.*cam(era)?$", name=~".*", site_name=~".*", sw_name=~"(Switch Flex Mini|Vieta)"}[$__interval]))
sum by (name) (rate(unpoller_remote_client_transmit_bytes_total{name!~".*camera.*|.*cam(era)?$", name=~".*", site_name=~".*", sw_name=~"CGU Minerva"}[$__interval]))
sum by (name) (rate(unpoller_remote_client_receive_bytes_total{name!~".*camera.*|.*cam(era)?$", name=~".*", site_name=~".*", sw_name=~"CGU Minerva"}[$__interval]))
